DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Changing Exercise Physical Activity Behavior Asthma Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The goal pilot study empirically test different interventional approach induce positive affect self-affirmation . At start study patient conjunction physician select program mild moderate physical activity exercise adopt maintain routine basis . Patients also complete Paffenbarger Physical Activity Exercise Index . Patients divide four group accord intervention receive : 1 ) positive affect ; 2 ) self-affirmation ; 3 ) positive affect self-affirmation ; 4 ) control . The main outcome change Paffenbarger Physical Activity Exercise Index score enrollment 4 week .
DOC.criteria: Patients eligible study physician consider medically able participate , 18 year age old , diagnosis mild moderate asthma base NHLBI Asthma Expert Panel 's classification system rate symptom , frequency exacerbation , nocturnal attack , activity restriction , use medication , pulmonary function . Patients exclude study follow reason : If unable walk several block whatever reason ; If musculoskeletal neurological deficit preclude increased physical activity ; If pulmonary disease ; If cardiac disease severe comorbidity ; If unable provide inform consent cognitive deficit ; If refuse participate .
